title: make geth failed on Raspbian
body:
Hello,

geth build doesn't work on Raspian
#### System information

Geth version: 1.4.6 and 1.4.9
Go version : 1.6.4
OS & Version: Raspian (Linux emonpi 4.1.19-v7+ #858 SMP Tue Mar 15 15:56:00 GMT 2016 armv7l GNU/Linux)
#### Actual behaviour

Errors :

```
pi@emonpi:~/ethereum/go-ethereum $ sudo make geth
build/env.sh go build -i -v  -o build/bin/geth ./cmd/geth

Makefile:16: recipe for target 'geth' failed
make: *** [geth] Error 2
```
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

After git clone, make geth failed 

thanks
Sam
Could you double check your Go version? There's no such version as 1.6.4.

Hi,

sorry I use 1.6.2 version

due to errors on build, I used another way to install geth : https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/wiki/Installation-Instructions-for-ARM  
It works from precompiled binary :)
